DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy SLIT compare placebo reduction symptom rescue medication usage
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Sublingual Immunotherapy ( SLIT ) Tablets Grass Pollen Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Written consent Grasspollen relate allergic rhinoconjunctivitis least last 2 pollen season . Sensitised grass pollen ( positive SPT RAST level least class 2 ) . Total symptom score RRTSS previous pollen season great equal 12 . Safety laboratory resuts within reference range Pregnancy , breastfeeding/lactation Had receive desensitisation treatment grass pollen Treatment immunotherapy another allergen within previous 5 year Usual contraindication immunotherapy serious immunopathologic condition malignancy Treated betablockers continuous corticotherapy
